name: firefly-actor-system-nodejs-bindings
description: NodeJS bindings for Firefly's actor system
author: IOTA Stiftung

scripts.pretest: yarn build:api && yarn neon build --profile production
scripts.build:binding: electron-build-env --disturl https://artifacts.electronjs.org/headers/dist -- yarn neon build --profile production && move-file native/index.node ./index.node
scripts.generate-declaration: tsc --project tsconfig.build.json --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir dist && move-file dist/backend/bindings/node/index.d.ts dist/index.d.ts
